Description: Warm intro call via Mark or Kumar. Establish relationship and identify pain points.
Success Criteria: Ryan agrees to quarterly reviews; Identifies 2-3 pain points
Notes: Make intro through Mark or Kumar; not cold outreach

Description: 1:1 with Kumar to understand Ryan's context and org dynamics.
Success Criteria: Kumar advocates for OvalEdge; Org chart + decision process clarified
Notes: Intelligence gathering call; use Kumar as translator

Description: Validate org chart; identify AI Council members; confirm budget process.
Success Criteria: Org chart updated; AI Council member list obtained; Budget process documented

Description: 2-day executive workshop with Ryan/Kumar/Mark and data product owners. Co-design governance model and certification workflows.
Success Criteria: $101K proposal drafted; Verbal commitment from Ryan; 3-5 pilot products identified
Notes: High-value consulting engagement; shows we listen to priorities

Description: 2-hour power-user training on advanced search; API enablement; custom dashboards.
Success Criteria: Training session conducted; 80% attendee satisfaction; 3+ power users active within 2 weeks
Notes: Immediate fix for 'clunky' perception; prevents escalation

Description: Develop 50-user askEdgi pilot proposal (60 days; Apr 1 - May 31). Focus on automated DQ + marketplace discovery.
Success Criteria: Proposal presented; Pilot approved (verbal/written); 50 users identified; Apr 1 launch locked

Description: Workshop to identify 5-8 priority data sources. Prioritize by impact and risk. Design automated DQ rules.
Success Criteria: $149K proposal drafted; 5-8 sources identified; Agreement to add 5+ connectors
Notes: Operational value play; only 2 connectors today = 5x upside

Description: 30-minute strategic briefing with COO. Position as executive sponsor. Discuss transformation ROI and CEO alignment.
Success Criteria: Meeting completed; Paul agrees to be sponsor; Commits to quarterly reviews
Notes: Paul is THE lever; COOs care about transformation outcomes + execution risk

Description: Launch 50-user askEdgi pilot. 60-day duration (Apr 1 - May 31). Track adoption; usage; NPS; testimonials.
Success Criteria: All 50 users onboarded; 80% activation (40+ active); 10+ queries/user/week; NPS 60+; 3+ exec testimonials
Notes: PROOF OF CONCEPT; usage data is best defense vs. competitive eval

Description: 45-minute demo to AI Council on AI governance; model lineage; PII compliance; automated DQ.
Success Criteria: Demo delivered to full AI Council; $131K proposal presented; Council requests enterprise rollout
Notes: AI Council cares about compliance; model transparency; PII protection

Description: SaaS migration planning. Readiness assessment. Define phased timeline; hypercare; resource allocation.
Success Criteria: Readiness assessment completed; Timeline agreed (Q3-Q4); $99.5K SOW signed; Resource plan locked
Notes: Get SOW signed while momentum high; de-risks migration risk

Description: Q1 QBR with Ryan; Kumar; Mark; Paul Wilson. Review execution; askEdgi results; services roadmap; renewal opportunity.
Success Criteria: QBR conducted; NPS 80+; Verbal renewal commitment; Pilot results presented; CFO briefing requested
column18: Turning point; after QBR; renewal should feel inevitable

Description: Document internal renewal business case. Current state; proposed expansion; services value; ROI; investment ask.
Success Criteria: Business case documented; Approved by OvalEdge leadership; Ready for customer presentation
Notes: Know OUR number before we present to them

Description: CFO (John Griek) introduction via Paul or Ryan. Present ROI; budget requirements; investment ask.
Success Criteria: Meeting completed (if needed); ROI presented; CFO verbal commitment to budget; No pricing objections
Notes: CFOs are allies once they understand ROI; not a threat
